name: DIEGO
description: DIEGO Token is a BNB Chain-based utility token issued by the DIEGO Foundation and serves as a key currency on the DIEGO platform. You can use the DIEGO Token to receive DeFi financial services on the Diago platform, and it is used as a payment method for NFT transactions such as NFT minting and NFT trading. In addition, it can be used in services provided by the DIEGO platform, such as online games and asset investment services.
